summary:
{"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official URLs for **OpenAI ChatGPT** pricing, help, and FAQ pages are as follows, based on the latest available information:

- **Pricing page:**  
  https://openai.com/chatgpt/pricing/  
  This is confirmed as the main ChatGPT pricing page, listing subscription options like ChatGPT Plus[2][4].  

- **Help page (including FAQ and support):**  
  https://help.openai.com/  
  For specific ChatGPT FAQ and help, this redirects to articles such as "What is ChatGPT?" and covers common questions about usage, pricing, privacy, and technical support[4].  

- **ChatGPT FAQ page (direct):**  
  https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6783457-what-is-chatgpt  
  This is the official FAQ for ChatGPT, describing pricing, features, privacy, and model details[4].

All three links above are official and current as of 2025. If you need API-specific pricing rather than ChatGPT subscription info, use https://openai.com/api/pricing/[1][2].

Citations:
[1] https://openai.com/api/pricing/
[2] https://community.openai.com/t/pricing-link-in-welcome-steps-points-to-chatgpt-pricing-and-not-api-pricing/1135863
[3] https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-plus/
[4] https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6783457-what-is-chatgpt
[5] https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/cognitive-services/openai-service/
","annotations":null,"meta":null}],"structuredContent":null,"isError":false}, {"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official URLs for **Anthropic Claude's** key pages are:

- **Pricing:**  
  [https://www.anthropic.com/pricing][3]

- **Help & Support (including FAQs):**  
  [https://support.anthropic.com/en/collections/4078531-claude][4]

- **API Pricing & FAQ:**  
  [https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/about-claude/pricing][5]

**Details:**  
- The official pricing page lists all core plans (Free, Pro, Max, Team, Enterprise), their features, and costs[3].
- The help/support/FAQ page provides guidance on account management, security, getting started, and troubleshooting for Claude[4].
- The API documentation pricing page offers model-specific API pricing details along with answers to frequently asked questions about usage and billing, especially for developers[5].

These are the authoritative sources recommended for the most accurate and up-to-date information on Claude by Anthropic.

Citations:
[1] https://team-gpt.com/blog/claude-pricing/
[2] https://zapier.com/blog/claude-api/

","annotations":null,"meta":null}],"structuredContent":null,"isError":false}, {"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official pricing, help, and FAQ pages for xAI Grok are as follows:

**Official Pricing Information:**  
- There are multiple tiers for Grok:
  - **X Premium**: $8/month or $84/year, includes Grok access on the X platform[2][3].
  - **X Premium+**: $16/month or $168/year, includes additional features and Grok access[2].
  - **SuperGrok Heavy**: $300/month, targeted at developers and enterprises, providing early access to Grok 4 Heavy and upcoming features[1][5].

**Official Help and FAQ Page:**  
- The official FAQ page for Grok is: [https://x.ai/legal/faq](https://x.ai/legal/faq)[4].  
  This page includes answers to common questions, guidance on access, age restrictions, parental controls, and specifics on the usage of Grok via mobile apps and web.

**X Platform Support:**  
- If using Grok via X (formerly Twitter), users should reference the X Help Center (accessible directly through the X platform) for X-specific subscription, billing, and support questions[4].

**Summary Table:**

| Page Type                | Official URL                               | Details                    |
|--------------------------|--------------------------------------------|----------------------------|
| Pricing (plans overview) | [https://techresearchonline.com/news/grok-4-launch-xai-supergrok-subscription-model/](https://techresearchonline.com/news/grok-4-launch-xai-supergrok-subscription-model/)[1]  | SuperGrok Heavy: $300/mo   |
| Pricing (in-app)         | See [X Premium: $8/mo, Premium+: $16/mo][2][3] | X-based Grok Access        |
| FAQ & Help               | [https://x.ai/legal/faq](https://x.ai/legal/faq)[4]         | Official xAI Grok FAQ      |

- **Key tip:** For the most up-to-date or region-specific details about subscriptions, always consult the official [xAI FAQ][4] or the help/support pages on the X platform itself.

Citations:
[1] https://techresearchonline.com/news/grok-4-launch-xai-supergrok-subscription-model/
[2] https://dorik.com/blog/how-to-use-grok-ai
[3] https://tech.co/news/grok-ai-pricing
[4] https://x.ai/legal/faq
[5] https://techcrunch.com/2025/07/09/elon-musks-xai-launches-grok-4-alongside-a-300-monthly-subscription/
